title: Elon Musk fought the law and Elon won
description:
Elon Musk isn’t happy about coronavirus closures. Here’s the backstory of how he fought to re-open the Tesla car factory in California and what workers have to say.

Featuring:
Sean O’Kane (@sokane1)

Links to Resources Discussed:
Elon Musk defies coronavirus order and asks to be arrested
When Big Tech calls 911

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
